item.title: As Mamdani Surges Ahead, Schumer Risks Finding Himself Left Behind

item.title: How China’s Rare Earth Chokehold Could Strangle Europe’s Military Buildup
item.description: Drones, missiles and other crucial components of Europe’s rush to rearm itself rely on an increasingly unsteady supply of minerals from China.

item.title: The ‘Worst Test in Medicine’ is Driving America’s High C-Section Rate

item.title: Russia Close to Its Biggest Capture of a Ukrainian City Since 2023
item.description: The Kremlin is focusing its fire on Pokrovsk, a gateway to the Donetsk region, which Russia’s president, Vladimir V. Putin, has long coveted.
